query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: main.id=link.mainid and main.status=1 and link.operatetype=93 and main.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and main.sendtime<'@endTime@' and link.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and link.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct link.mainid,main.sheetid,main.title,main.senddeptid,link.operatedeptid,main.sendtime from emergencydrill_main main,emergencydrill_link link where main.id=link.mainid and main.status=1 and link.operatetype=93 and main.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and main.sendtime<'@endTime@' and link.operatedeptid='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: main.id=link.mainid and main.status=1 and link.operatetype=93 and link.operatetime>main.maincompletetime and main.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and main.sendtime<'@endTime@' and link.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and link.operatedeptid is not null
